# Mobile Saunas

Our mobile saunas are designed to be easily transported so you can enjoy hot
steam and relaxation just about anywhere.

Each sauna is built to your specifications, allowing you to choose the
capacity (3-8 people), shape, windows and doors, heater (electric or wood-
fired) finish, lighting, and much more.

We have delivered hundreds of saunas since 2013, all over the USA and even
Canada.

## Check out some of the mobile saunas we've built...

Our sauna design is based on traditional Finnish saunas but with modern
comforts and conveniences. Placed on a tiny house trailer, our saunas are
easily towed behind your car.

Our customers are using our mobile saunas for many different purposes. At
campgrounds to offer guests some extra relaxation. For private events such as
weddings and birthdays. For renting out as additional income….the list goes
on.

Contact us below for a custom quote.

Abby Cali

We rented the mobil sauna and it was fantastic! Great customer service
throughout our 5 day rental. Sigmar provided us with a box of firewood cut to
size for the stove and we enjoyed every moment of our sauna time! The sauna
was clean, neat and well worth it. Delivery and pick up were friendly, fast
and easy. I would highly recommend it for a spa weekend at home.

Margit-Joanna Pikkor

As a brand new owner of a BZB sauna, I can’t be more pleased and thankful for
the versatility and quality craftsmanship. The sauna is wonderfully roomy and
well designed. Very much looking forward to purchasing another BZB sauna for
my Vermont ski house!!! A+++ customer service. 😀😀👍👍👍
